name: Plus un Zeste !
description:
You are a lemon trapped in Pedro's kitchen, find the open window and escape !

But be careful, this kitchen is not up to health and safety standards : Knives, dirt, flames and other dangers await you around the corner ...

And you thought you could roll peacefully through the kitchen? Pedro hates when his fruits try to escape ! Hide from him, or he will make a lemonade out of you !

Watch my school interview of me talking about the Game Jam and my game on YouTube !

____

Controls
  • WASD : Move
  • Mouse : Rotate view
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • Escape : Pause
  • R : Reset level

____

Rules

Your goal is to find the open window in the level and exit.

The window is always at the end of the level.

Knives and forks, rot, flames deals you damages on contact.

If you fall on the ground, you will die !

In the top right corner you can see Pedro's view. Try to keep an eye on it or you will get caught at the wrong moment ...

When you hide, you have to wait a bit for Pedro to lose patience and walk away, but be careful, he might turn around when you don't expect it !

There are 9 different levels, have fun beating them !

If you find any bugs or you just want to send me feedback, you can leave a message here but I would prefer if you can send me an email at clement.dev.baudonnel@gmail.com :) !

____

Tips

Lemons don't have really strong muscles but if you spam your jump you can climb small slopes and roll a bit faster !

There are often a hard way for speedrunners and an easy way. Try to make the best timer possible !
